Top Halal Cusine
Best Katy Rolls

I’m hungry

Our specialty is Halal

Growing up in Kazakstan our Nani would make us incredible dishes on weekends, but her signature seasoning was Chutney Sauce, a combination of yogurt, mint leaves and marsalla that got the family together every time. Our Halal tradition has brought us thus far and we plan to continue our Nani's tradition through her kitchen legacy.

4

Chutney Roll -- Spicy beef served on a flat bread with onions and special chutney sauce

5
